description: _check_graphics_addresses_can_live_migrate(listen_addrs) and _verify_serial_console_is_disabled() should be move to can_live_migrate_source/dest method to reduce extra operations of pre_live_migration and roll_back calling.
title: Move graphics and serial console check to can_live_migrate_source/dest

comments.content: _check_graphics_addresses_can_live_migrate(listen_addrs) and _verify_serial_console_is_disabled() should be move to can_live_migrate_source/dest method to reduce extra operations of pre_live_migration and roll_back calling.
